description: This file is a server entry point for a Remix application using React. It handles incoming HTTP requests, determines if the request is from a bot or a browser, and streams server-rendered React components to the client, managing response headers and errors.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main handler function for incoming HTTP requests; sets CORS headers and delegates to bot or browser request handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests, streaming HTML content immediately.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests, streaming HTML content.
